pr_title: Update with new thin pool sizes

timeline.message: Update thin pool sizes after changes in internal repo
Update after changes in code this dependends on

timeline.bodyText: Will this code be exercised for currently provisioned hosts too, and that are using the old thin pool sizes?  How does that work?  AFAIK, only if we're currently enlarging (rounding up) the node resources will prepare  now instead require a larger disk, which may involve... migration I guess?
timeline.author: hakonhall

replies.bodyText:
If someone specified less resources than what is now legal, their deployment will fail.
If someone specified resource range and they are nearly not utilizing anything, then they will be scaled to minimum - which is now increased, so they will be migrated. The rest should not be changed.
replies.author: freva
